Package fr.uge.patchwork

Class PatchesList

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.patchwork.PatchesList
public class PatchesList extends Object
Representation of a list of patches
Author:
BERNIER Valentin, VILAYVANH Mickael

  • Constructor Summary

    PatchesList()
    PatchesList constructor : Create an empty patchesList with the neutralTokenPosition at the position 0.

  • Method Details

    • loadPatches

      public void loadPatches(Path path, int gameMode) throws IOException
      Load the patchesList from the UTF8 file located at the Path path.
      Parameters:
      path - Path of the file to read
      gameMode - game mode
      Throws:
      IOException - In case of file reading error

    • isInTheThreeNext

      public boolean isInTheThreeNext(int patchPosition)
      Check if the Patch located at patchPosition is in one of the three next Patch after the neutral token.
      Parameters:
      patchPosition - The Patch's position to check
      Returns:
      true if it is in the three next, false otherwise

      Parameters:
      position - Position of the patch to take.
      player - The player taking the patch.
      Returns:
      The taken patch

    • isAValidPatch

      public boolean isAValidPatch(int position, Player player)
      Check if the patch at position is possible to take.
      Parameters:
      position - The patch position to check.
      player - The player concerned by the verification.
      Returns:
      true if it is possible, false otherwise

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()

    • coordToPatchId

      public int coordToPatchId(double x, double y)
      Return the patch id that correspond to the mouse coordinates
      Parameters:
      x - X position
      y - Y position
      Returns:
      Patch id; -1 if skip turn button; -2 if no patch is here
